document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Strong </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Draughts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Refreshing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Minds </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">drink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">enables </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Mine </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Through </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Desert </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Wilderness </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">bore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">sealed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Wine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">elastic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Camel's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">trait </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">attained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">powerful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">stimulus </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Hermetic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Mind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Strong draughts of their refreshing minds
